alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 4:14PM EDT until August 15 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 313 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Graceville to 8 miles west of Marianna to 7 miles southeast of Chipley, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marianna, Malone, Cottondale, Greenwood, Campbellton, Bascom, Jacob City, Blue Spring, Star, Cottondale Airport, Jacobs, Chipola Terrace, Ellaville, Marianna Municipal A/P, Sills and Kynesville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
